content.en: Parallel program optimization: Researchers are exploring how program transformation frameworks can improve the performance of parallel applications on shared-memory multiprocessors. They are also investigating the use of automatic recognition of algorithmic patterns to support loop optimization and parallelization. Additionally, they are studying different algorithms for loop parallelization and their ability to incorporate optimizing criteria.
content.da: Parallel programoptimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan programtransformationsrammer kan forbedre ydelsen af parallelle applikationer på delte hukommelsesmultiprocessorer. De undersøger også brugen af automatisk genkendelse af algoritmiske mønstre for at understøtte loopoptimering og parallelisering. Derudover studerer de forskellige algoritmer til loopparallelisering og deres evne til at inkorporere optimeringskriterier.
